results.question: What is the meaning of green arrow traffic light?
choices: Allowing vehicles to go right or left
It is prohibited to enter on the direction of the arrow

results.question: Broken yellow line on the road means:
choices: It is prohibited to overtake on the left or right side
You are allowed to overtake on the right side
You are allowed to overtake on the left side
